thread.section_title: Parts Town Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parts Town | partstown.com | 4 of 128
thread.title: DS

author: DS
title: DS
text: I ordered one part, but my order was duplicated 4 times, and my billing address got attached to another company's orders. So, now I have to wait until they send me return paperwork (said it would take 1-2 days, but it's now a week and I haven't seen it). Meanwhile, they charged me 4x what I was supposed to be charged, and I won't get credit until I send back the extra parts (still waiting for paperwork), and who knows how long after that. Fix your website!
